_sText:
Hello! This is the 2nd map from Companions of the North (CoN)! 
This was all made by Haavard_Fotball (Same STEAM-ID).

Download gives:
- Readme
- VMF. File (Map)
- BSP. File (Map)

To run the map, open the VMF. in hammer and compile it (3-4 min compile) or just open CSS
and create server (with the BSP. file, MUCH FASTER)

You can play this one like a normal fy-map with equal teams,
or you can play with a friend or something against many bots!

Go to properties of CSS and add -console as starting option for console!
Console commands for zombie gameplay:
First join T with a friend (or solo)
mp_limitteams 20 (allow unbalanced team up till 20 players)
mp_autoteambalance 0 (Don't allow the game to balance teams)
bot_Add_ct -> add the amount you want to fight
mp_Flashlight 1 (to add flashlight)
Bot_Knives_Only 1 (Make them go around with knives, like in ZM)

I recommend adding zombie skins to make the CTs (or Ts) look more "zombish"!
More fun with Shot GUN! :D

Hope you enjoy the game! Please leave a comment at gamebanana or contact me at steam!
Also; Join our CoN group on Steam!

5th of August 2011
Haavard_Fotball
